svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of consumer expenditure spent on alcoholic beverages and tobacco
Share of total consumer expenditure spent on alcoholic beverages and tobacco in 2015, versus gross domestic product (GDP)
Share of consumer expenditure spend on alcohol and tobacco
Source: World Bank – WDI, Consumer expenditure on food - USDA (2017)
